task.title: Focus on the why
task.body: Today, ask a colleague who do they feel your organization impacts the most and why?

sharingWall.question: What new insights did you gain by talking to your colleague?
sharingWall.exampleText: I discovered that the way me and my colleague feel about the impact of our work is very much aligned, even though our roles are different.

task.title: Focus on the why
task.body: Today, ask a colleague who do they feel your organisation’s work impacts most and why?

followUp.title: Check-in
followUp.body: Time to check-in with today’s quest!

sharingWall.question: What was it like for you to do today’s quest?

task.title: Foca-te no porquê
task.body: Hoje pergunta a um ou vários colegas a quem acham que a vossa organização causa mais impacto e porquê?

sharingWall.question: Que insights novos ganhaste ao falar com os teus colegas?
sharingWall.exampleText: Descobri que a forma como eu e os meus colegas nos sentimos sobre o impacto do nosso trabalho está muito alinhada, embora os nossos papéis sejam diferentes.
